meanings.definition: A member of the United States Marine Corps.
meanings.sent1: The brave leatherneck stood tall in his uniform.
meanings.sent2: I admire the dedication of every leatherneck in service.
meanings.sent3: The leatherneck joked about doing push-ups in their sleep.
meanings.sent4: She was a true leatherneck, tough as nails.
meanings.sent5: The leatherneck's loyalty to their country was unwavering.

meanings.definition: A type of strong, flexible material made from animal skin, typically used for making clothing or accessories.
meanings.sent1: The jacket was made of high-quality leatherneck.
meanings.sent2: She loved the feel of the soft leatherneck against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a dress using leatherneck.
meanings.sent4: The bag was as tough as leatherneck, lasting for years.
meanings.sent5: The smell of new leatherneck filled the room, enticing customers.
